# ireaRscripts

The goal of this package is to collect useful re-usable "R" scripts developed by personnell
of the Milano section of CNR-IREA (Institute on Remote Sensing of Environment - National Research Council, Italy - http://www.irea.cnr.it/en/)

## Installation

You can install ireaRscripts from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("IREA-CNR-MI/ireaRscripts")
```
